description.english: Use Payback Instant Recovery to quickly rise after being knocked down. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.spanish: Usa la Venganza Recuperación instantánea para levantarte rápidamente. (Exhibición contra IA)
description.german: Komm mit Payback Soforterholung nach einem K.O. wieder auf die Beine. (Gegen KI in EXHIBITION)
description.french: Utilisez le Payback Récupération instantanée après avoir été mis à terre. (EXHIBITION contre I.A.)
description.italian: Usa il Payback Recupero istantaneo per rialzarti subito da terra (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).
description.arabic: ‏استخدم Payback Instant Recovery للنهوض سريعًا بعد الإطاحة بك. (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)

description.english: Use Payback Spray Poison Mist to your opponent's face. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.german: Setze Payback Giftspray Versprühen gegen das Gesicht deines Gegners ein. (Gegen KI in EXHIBITION)
description.french: Utilisez le Payback Brume empoisonnée au visage de votre adversaire. (EXHIBITION contre I.A.)
description.italian: Usa il Payback Nebbia velenosa sul volto dell'avversario (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).
description.spanish: Usa la Venganza Niebla tóxica en el rostro de tu oponente. (Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏استخدم Payback Spray Poison Mist في وجه خصمك. (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)

displayName.german: Ich werde für dich da sein!

description.english: Activate the Run-In Payback. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.german: Aktiviere den Eingreifen-Payback. (Gegen KI in EXHIBITION)
description.french: Activez le Payback Intervenir. (EXHIBITION contre I.A.)
description.italian: Attiva il Payback Interferenza (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).
description.spanish: Activa la Venganza Interferencia. (Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏قم بتنشيط تدخل Payback. (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)

displayName.french: Rien de personnel, juste du business

description.english: Hit your Finisher immediately after activating Blackout Payback. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.german: Benutze deinen Finisher direkt nach Aktivierung des Blackout-Paybacks. (Gegen KI in EXHIBITION)
description.french: Utilisez votre Finisher juste après avoir activé le Payback Blackout. (EXHIBITION contre I.A.)
description.italian: Metti a segno la mossa finale subito dopo il Payback Blackout (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).
description.spanish: Usa tu remate justo después de activar la Venganza Apagón. (Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏اضرب باستخدام Finisher مباشرة بعد تنشيط Blackout Payback (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)

description.english: Use the Tank buff to minimize damage from your opponent's Finisher. (PLAY mode agaisnt A.I.)
description.german: Reduziere mit dem Tank-Bonus den Schaden des Finishers deines Gegners. (Gegen KI in EXHIBITION)
description.french: Utilisez l'avantage Tank pour minimiser les dégâts du Finisher adverse. (EXHIBITION contre I.A.)
description.italian: Usa Carrarmato per indebolire la mossa finale avversaria (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).
description.spanish: Usa el Potenciador de tanque para minimizar el daño del remate de tu rival. (Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: ‏استخدم دفعة Tank لتقليل ضرر Finisher (خصمك. (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي

description.english: Use Payback Low Blow to slow your opponent down. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.german: Nimm deinem Gegner mit dem Tiefschlag-Payback den Fahrtwind. (Gegen KI in EXHIBITION)
description.french: Utilisez le Payback Coup bas pour ralentir votre adversaire. (EXHIBITION contre I.A.)
description.italian: Esegui il Payback Colpo basso per rallentare l'avversario (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).

description.arabic: استخدم ضربة Payback (تحت الحزام لإبطاء سرعة خصمك. (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي

description.english: Finish your opponent using a possum pin. (PLAY mode against A.I.)

description.italian: Batti l'avversario per schienamento dopo aver usato Finto esanime (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).

description.italian: Liberati da una sottomissione senza mai far sovrapporre gli indicatori (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).
description.spanish: Líbrate de una sumisión sin que la barra del rival se solape con la tuya. (Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: أفلت من حركة استسلام من دون حدوث تداخل. (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)

description.english: Finish an opponent without landing a finisher or signature. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.german: Erledige einen Gegner ohne einen Finisher oder einen Signature. (Gegen KI in EXHIBITION)
description.french: Finissez un adversaire sans avoir utilisé de Finisher ou de coup spécial. (EXHIBITION contre I.A.)
description.italian: Sconfiggi un avversario senza colpirlo con una mossa speciale o finale (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).
description.spanish: Acaba con tu rival sin asestarle un remate o un movimiento personal. (Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: اقضِ على خصم من دون ضربه بـfinisher أو signature. (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)

description.english: Attack an opponent with the Tripod Foreign Object (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.german: Greife einen Gegner mit dem Objekt Stativ an. (Gegen KI in EXHIBITION)
description.french: Attaquez un adversaire avec l'objet Trépied. (EXHIBITION contre I.A.)
description.italian: Attacca un avversario con il cavalletto (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).
description.spanish: Ataca a un rival con el trípode. (Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: (هاجم خصمًا بغرض حاملة الكاميرا الخارجي. (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي

description.english: Use the Adrenaline Payback to Carry an opponent over your weight class. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.german: Benutze Payback Adrenalinbonus, um einen schweren Gegner zu heben. (Gegen KI in EXHIBITION)
description.french: Portez un adversaire d'une catégorie supérieure avec le Payback Adrénaline. (EXHIBITION contre I.A.)
description.italian: Trasporta un avversario di classe di peso superiore con Payback Adrenalina (ESIBIZIONE contro IA).
description.spanish: Usa la Venganza Adrenalina y carga a un rival de categoría de peso superior. (Exhibición contra IA)
description.arabic: استخدم Payback الأدرينالين لتحمل خصمًا أعلى من فئة وزنك. (معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)

description.german: Meine KARRIERE: Schließe Kapitel 1 ab.
description.french: Ma CARRIÈRE : Terminez le Chapitre 1.
description.italian: La mia CARRIERA: completa il capitolo 1.
description.spanish: Mi CARRERA: completa el capítulo 1.
description.arabic: ‏MyCAREER: أكمل الفصل الأول.
